Package com.valstro.hometask.transaction

Interface Transaction

All Known Implementing Classes:
SearchTxn
public interface Transaction
Transactions are used for data exchange between application and the server. Transactions have unique UUID to differentiate one transaction form another.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Interface
    Description
    static enum 
    Transaction.Status
    Transaction status:
    NEW - new transaction that is executed COMPLETE - transaction has completed successfully and results are ready FAILED - transaction has failed and did not complete

  • Method Details

    • execute

      void execute(Client client)
      Execute a transaction using provided client. The client must be connected in order for transaction to send and receive the data.
      Parameters:
      client - client to be used

    • getResult

      String getResult()
      Returns result once transaction has completed successfully and result compiled
      Returns:
      complete result or null if transaction failed

    • isComplete

      boolean isComplete()
      Checks transaction status
      Returns:
      true if transaction has completed or failed, otherwise false

    • getId

      String getId()
      Unique transaction ID
      Returns:
      transaction id

    • getError

      String getError()
      Returns cause for transactions failure
      Returns:
      cause or null if transaction completed successfully

    • getStatus

      Transaction.Status getStatus()
      Current transaction status
      Returns:
      status
